text: I can't say enough about how amazing Coach Desheng is! My son Julius‚Äôs swimming skills have improved drastically under his guidance. He is incredibly patient, knowledgeable, and always create a positive and encouraging environment. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced swimmer, he tailor each session to meet your needs and help you achieve your goals. Highly recommend!

My child had a wonderful time with Coach Leong. She looks forward to every lesson and leaves a happy child at the end of lesson. Coach is highly engaging and patient with the kids. I would certainly recommend him to other parents who are seeking for a fun and engaging swimming instructor!

Big thank you to Coach Leong for his dedication and passion in teaching swimming. Very versatile in adapting to different learning style.

His empowering and encouraging nature has helped my daughter to swim confidently.

Highly recommended if you are looking for a swim coach!

Coach Leong has his ways with kids. His swim sessions are always full of fun and laughter from the kids. My kids loved every sessions with him. They were previously under a different coach for a period of time and didn't make any progress. But after a few sessions with Coach Leong, they managed to swim with confident.
Definitely a must go-to if you are looking for a swim coach!

Coach De Sheng is a very friendly and funny person. He constructs his class such as a playful setting, and at the same time teaching the correct techniques to the students. His beliefs is that students needs to play and enjoy, then instilling interest, and therefore it will be easier for students to pick up skills. 2 üëçüëç up!
